title: Summer Friday #6: Jason Kander | Sean Spicer Book Excerpts | Summer Book Club
description:
Exclusively for this Summer Friday podcast, Seth Meyers interviews Jason Kander, who is running for mayor of Kansas City. Their longform interview begins at 0:37.

Then at 19:44, hear an exclusive comedy sketch in which Late Night's John Lutz reads some "excerpts" from Sean Spicer's new memoir.

Finally at 23:05, hear some book recommendations from Late Night staffers.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
